sentences.sentence: The factory is compactly laid out as a whole.
sentences.translation: 这个工厂整个布局显得紧凑。

sentences.sentence: Erich Gamma: You can explain an existing system with patterns way more compactly than without.
sentences.translation: Erich Gamma：使用模式可以更加简洁的说明一个存在的系统。

sentences.sentence: That is, anything you can represent in XML, you can represent (almost always more compactly) in YAML.
sentences.translation: 即，您可以用XML表示的任何东西，都可以用YAML表示(几乎总是更紧凑)。
